SELECT RECID, EVENTDESC, MAINTYPENAME, DATE_FORMAT( NEWINSTTIME, "%Y-%m" ) NEWINSTTIME FROM tocgcase WHERE date( NEWINSTTIME ) >= DATE_SUB( CURDATE( ), INTERVAL 12 MONTH ) ORDER BY NEWINSTTIME DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT DISTRICTNAME, COUNT( RECID ) as NUMBER FROM tocgcase WHERE date( NEWINSTTIME ) >= DATE_SUB( CURDATE( ), INTERVAL 12 MONTH ) GROUP BY DISTRICTNAME
SELECT t.MAINTYPENAME as name,t.num FROM ( SELECT MAINTYPENAME, COUNT(1) AS num FROM tocgcase GROUP BY MAINTYPENAME ) t ORDER BY t.num DESC limit 0,5;
select DISTRICTNAME as name from tocgcase GROUP BY DISTRICTNAME;
select COUNT(*) from tocgcase where DISTRICTNAME= #{area} and tocgcase.CREATETIME >= #{startdate} and tocgcase.CREATETIME <= #{enddate}
select EVENTTYPENAME as name,COUNT(*) as num from tocgcase GROUP BY EVENTTYPENAME
select DISTRICTNAME as name,COUNT(*) as num from tocgcase where tocgcase.CREATETIME LIKE '%2017-12%' GROUP BY DISTRICTNAME
